name: Blocky Trial
description:
Known bugs (HTML Only): Cant pick-up : CAPS LOCK

Play the PC version for full controller support and dynamic music.

A nice puzzle platformer, centering on a group of BLOCKS stranded on the moon and are contently tested with new challenges.

Connect and Disconnect when needed to gain new abilities (and some pounds),and find new ways to complete the game as fast as possible.

I would like any comments and Best-Times, Ben.
